attributes.action: review planning policy as I have been denied the chance to build a house in my hometown in North Norfolk on land belonging to my family (even though OPP had been granted on it in the past) as the LPA state that they will only allow me to build a house if it was for holiday use only in accordance with their policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have had to move from my hometown of Holt,North Norfolk,due to the cost of housing in relation to an average Norfolk salary and demand for holiday homes.The only chance I have of returning has been wiped out by the LPA as my Aunt gave me a plot of land which had OPP on it previously but since then the development plan has changd and the LPA will now only allow a holiday home,not a permanent one. The LPA hide behind policy and Ruth Kelly's department have said they do not get involved with local planning issues. To add insult to injury the LPA have given PP to build a carpark nearby, even though that is outside the development boundary and destroys a few acres of greenfield!!I hope that my petition will highlight the flaws in planning policy, get my case reviewed and help local people like myself being able to live in the hometown that they love and not get discriminated against compared to second home owners.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
